knimeNode.name: K-Means
knimeNode.shortDescription: Creates a crisp center based clustering.

fullDescription.intro: This node outputs the cluster centers for a predefined number of clusters (no dynamic number of clusters). K-means performs a crisp clustering that assigns a data vector to exactly one cluster. The algorithm terminates when the cluster assignments do not change anymore. The node can be configured as follows:
fullDescription.option: The number of clusters (cluster centers) to be created.
The number of iterations after which the algorithm terminates, independent of the accuracy improvement of the cluster centers.

ports.dataIn: Input to clustering. All numerical values and only these are considered for clustering.
ports.dataOut: The input data labeled with the cluster they are contained in.

views.view: Displays the cluster prototypes in a tree-like structure, with each node containing the coordinates of the cluster center.
